attributes.action: Halt the Military Strikes in Syria (by public demand)
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this petition for there are lives at risk including the many civilians who are currently hospitalized through the Douma attacks. The last thing they would want is their lives being put into collateral at the expense of further destruction.
attributes.background: The recent attacks based around chemical weapons in Syria are appalling and go against the values of what we deem acceptable in warfare. However there are better ways of dealing with these incidents rather than striking targets and bringing more civilian bloodshed to the Middle East.
